newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU invites tenders for vegetable oil food aid.
newsitem.headline: EU invites tenders for vegetable oil food aid.

text.p: The European Union is inviting tenders for two shipments of 1,000 tonnes of rapeseed or sunflower oil to Tajikistan and Angola, the EU Official Journal said on Tuesday.
Tenders for the aid, which will be distributed through the Rome-based World Food Programme, are due to be submitted to the European Commission by May 20.
